channel.title: Uppit Error?
channel.description:
anyone else getting this shiz when trying to download something? ... On all of the files i have tried to download today?
Error happened when generating Download Link. Please try again or Contact administrator. (500 Can't connect to server230.uppit.com:8080 (connect: Connection timed out) )

item.dc:creator: @anti_man444 anti man444
item.description:

ye my it’s also over

Read full topic

like this i want to download this but error

  • http://uppit.com/hpzemsro9k0z/cache.rar

  • http://up.ht/NcbgDH

anyone can resolve this chit?[/quote]
It’s an old topic, but not too long ago Uppit was down. I have no other trouble whatsoever.

item.title: Uppit Error?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:439271”][quote author=Crown2 link=topic=541974.msg3972127#msg3972127 date=1334265784]

uppit is crap anyway whenever I try to unarchive something from their site I downloaded I always get errors > >

i have actually noticed that also i just assumed it was a packing error
[/quote]I really can’t explain why it does that to be honest I can upload the very same item to mediafire etc and it’s perfectly fine but with uppit I always get unarchiving errors.[/quote]I’ve been getting that from other websites too before, it’s like the archive file is corrupt, not downloaded fully and even if you retry it will still download it corrupted (temporary as far as i can remember).

Read full topic
